description: Payment Status Report - RJCT Status Only (CBPR+ Compliant)
note: Per CBPR+ specification, pacs.002 to MT transformation only supports RJCT (Rejected) status. Non-RJCT statuses (ACSC, PDNG, ACCP) are not supported for MT199/MT299 transformation.

scenarios.description: Advice of returned cheque with RJCT status - transforms to MT199/MT299 REJT
Stop payment request rejected with RJCT status - transforms to MT199/MT299 REJT
